website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a set of stickers for various holidays with a large quantity, these are a great bargain. Perfect for decorating, party favors, or classroom use.
pros: Packed with bright colors and themes that match holidays and seasons year-round
Stickers don't contain acid, which makes them safe to use on photos
Huge set comes with 25 sheets and 44 designs, totaling 2,500 stickers
cons: Lacks stickers for some holidays, such as Easter and St. Patrick's Day

customer_reviews.title: Small but VERY CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is involved in a reading program where you track how many books are read. Every time she reads a book, she can choose from very cute seasonal stickers to track her progress!! Every season is just adorable! The little ice cream cones are adorable! Only drawback is they are a little on the small side. They are about dime sized, maybe a hair smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Incentives for my First Graders!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as an incentive for my first graders. We use the behavior clip chart in our room and when my students clip off the chart they get to decorate their clothespin with a jewel of choice. These are very nice looking jewels. They come in various colors, sizes, and shapes. There is enough to last me all year I think! Perfect for what I need. Con: I use wooden clothespins so these don’t stick as well to the clothespin as I had hoped but nothing a little bit of glue can’t fix. I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely_Jo

customer_reviews.title: Teacher must have
customer_reviews.text: For some reason as a teacher I have tons of large and medium stickers, but I needed small stickers for checking in papers every day. I love these because they are the perfect size, and they are seasonal! They are perfect, and I will definitely buy them again (but I won't need to for a long time because there are so many!)
customer_reviews.author: Kallie Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great teacher stickers!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and includes more designs than are pictured. These are great as rewards and for teaching the seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amateurathlete

customer_reviews.title: Slightly smaller than a dime, but they suit my needs
customer_reviews.text: I use these stickers as little 'rewards' for my to-do lists. They are slightly smaller than a dime and I like them. I wish there were maybe a little more variety in sticker, but it suites my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mozue

customer_reviews.title: Best deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love to have plenty of seasonal stickers on hand for my students. This pack is the best price per sticker out there! Stickers are small, but for the price you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: Love Trend stickers!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I'm excited to find seasonal scented stickers because then I know which I've already used once during the year!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Naquin

customer_reviews.title: great variety
customer_reviews.text: The assortment of seasons these stickers cover is great. My students, preschoolers, can easily remove the stickers but they still stick well. We use them for counting, patterning, decorating and other fun activities.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bridgewater

customer_reviews.title: Shiny Lovely Images
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Trend? These are the Rolls Royce of sticker image creations...all neatly arranged on a shiny page. Recommended, especially for teachers. Have bought these 3 times now.
customer_reviews.author: PatKat9000

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rewards
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for rewards. I use these when I catch good behavior! I place a small sticker on their name tags as I walk around the room. After 25, my students get a reward!
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for incentive charts. Still sticky and got them last year.
customer_reviews.author: AZ24

customer_reviews.title: It was great. Everyone enjoyed saying what their roll had to ...
customer_reviews.text: used these stickers along with the flags and wrote grateful notes to put into the rolls at the dinner table. It was great. Everyone enjoyed saying what their roll had to say and then we elaborated on what else we were grateful for.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R. Volpe

customer_reviews.title: ... these for a friend in China and think she'll like them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend in China and think she'll like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Especially love the turkeys
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Exactly as expected. Fits perf on a sticker chart. Especially love the turkeys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for classrooms!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for teachers. I used these in my classroom to track behavior, grades, homework, etc. The kids LOVED picking out new stickers each week.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Stickers are as advertised. Great selection to use throughout the year.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I must love them I keep buying them over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: RC21

customer_reviews.title: Highly Suggest
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mixture if stickers for all holiday and seasons! Highly suggest
customer_reviews.author: Bethanie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stickers and my kids love them in my classroom. Great for rewards for sicker charts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful collections
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are wonderful to use with my kiddos. Lots of season choices.
customer_reviews.author: dingo635

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these for fine motor activities with my K kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Benner

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and quantity. Been using these for years with my students and children.
customer_reviews.author: jennea96

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of stickers for every season. They stick well and are perfect size for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Cjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I always get these for my kids chore charts. Work great!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Like Statue of Liberty
customer_reviews.text: Many sets here are not seasons! Like Statue of Liberty, flags,
customer_reviews.author: I. Wells

product_meta.title: Trend Enterprises Seasons superSpots & superShapes Stickers Variety, Pack of 2500
product_meta.description: You will have all the stickers needed for all seasons. Includes 44 designs for Pre-K to 9th graders. Stickers are acid-free, non-toxic, and safe for use on photos. Set of 2500 stickers includes 25 sheets.
feature_bullets: Cute, colorful stickers help spotlight good behavior, boost motivation, and make good habits stick.
Great on homework, incentive pads and charts, and more.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
